text: Kist, ki ʙa Alloh taolo qarz dihad; qarzi naku [va az amvolas dar rohi xusnudii Parvardigor infoq kunad], to [Alloh taolo] onro ʙarojas candin ʙaroʙar kunad? Va Alloh taolo ast, ki [az ruji hikmat va adolat, dar ruzii ʙandagonas] tangi va kusois padid meovarad va [hamagi dar oxirat] ʙa suji U ʙozgardonda mesaved
